DOC.brief_title: Intermittent Calorie Restriction , Insulin Resistance , Biomarkers Brain Function
DOC.detailed_description: Being overweight obese cause insulin resistance ( IR ) , define reduced responsiveness insulin cell various tissue organ . IR midlife increase risk develop Alzheimer disease ( AD ) . We recently discover novel biomarkers brain IR ( alter Tyr Ser phosphorylated form insulin receptor substrate 1 ; IRS-1 ) plasma exosomes enrich neuronal origin . Moreover , IR associate AD biomarkers include deficit rest state brain activity cognitive performance . Calorie restriction define consume few calorie consider normal without lack nutrient . A certain type calorie restriction , one consume 500-600 calorie day two consecutive day , follow non-restricted eating 5 day ( 5-2 CR ) , show low peripheral insulin resistance effectively . Effects CR lower peripheral IR brain IR cognition unknown . The goal exploratory pilot study provide proof-of-concept 5-2 CR midlife reverse brain IR , low peripheral IR , improve cognitive performance , increase brain activation rest task . Specifically , study effect 8 week 5-2 CR versus control dietary intervention brain peripheral IR , memory executive function , rest state default mode network activity , brain metabolism , AD biomarkers . Forty overweight obese woman men ( 55 70 year age ) randomize 1:1 5-2 CR control group . In 5-2 CR group , participant offer healthy living dietary counseling baseline , instruct implement five days/week . For two consecutive days/week , consume two shake ( Boost , CWI Medical ) , provide total 480 Kcal/day . In control group , participant offer healthy living dietary counseling baseline , ask implement every day week . Participants undergo screen include history physical examination , calculation Body Mass Index ( BMI , must great equal 27 ) blood draw insulin glucose determine whether insulin resistance . If participant meet eligibility criterion , continue baseline visit involve anthropometric measure , questionnaire , test cognitive function , brain MRI , blood draw plasma peripheral blood mononuclear cell , lumbar puncture cerebrospinal fluid biomarkers AD . After 8 week , collect measure . To assess reinforce compliance respective diet , participant come clinic every 2 week discuss compliance , measure body weight perform blood draw measurement ketone objectively confirm energy restriction 5-2 CR group . We also contact participant every week ensure compliance . To assess effect diet physical activity , participant ask wear accelerometer 96 hour diet .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : BMI great equal 27 ; addition , weight le equal 350 lb ( weight limit MRI scanner ) ; Age 5570 year ; HOMAIR great equal 1.8 ; MMSE great equal 26 EXCLUSION CRITEIRA : History cardiovascular disease ; History clinically significant stroke neurological disease central nervous system ; History substance abuse past 6 month positive urine drug screen ; History clinically significant endocrine disorder ( common mild endocrine disorder , untreated subclinical hypothyroidism TSH < 10 mU/l successfully treat hypothyroidism may allow ) ; History eat disorder , significant GI disorder malabsorption disorder ; History type 2 diabetes ; and/or use antidiabetes medication insulin ; and/or type 2 diabetes diagnose screen visit base fast glucose > 125 mg/dL ; History hypoglycemia ; and/or fast glucose < 70 mg/dL screen visit . Current use systemic corticosteroid ; Positive screening test HIV , HCV HBV ; Hematocrit le 35 % hemoglobin le 11 mg/dL ; ALT AST > 1.5 time upper normal limit ; Contraindications MRI ( pacemaker , ferrous metal implant shrapnel around head , etc. ) . Contraindications LP , Coumadin , coagulopathy ( international normalize ratio , INR > 1.5 ; prothrombin time ( PT ) , partial prothrombin time ( PTT ) > 1.5 x upper normal limit ) . Aspirin 81 mg qd allow . Aspirin 325 mg qd allow , withhold 7 day prior LP . Pregnancy nursing . Refusal consent genetic test APOE .
